name: Virtua Fighter 3: Team Battle
overview: Virtua Fighter 3 (Japanese: バーチャファイター3, Hepburn: Bācha Faitā Surī) is the sequel to 1994's Virtua Fighter 2 and the third fighting game in the Virtua Fighter series, developed by Sega AM2 and published by Sega in 1996. It was the first arcade game to run on the Sega Model 3 system board.  The Team Battle release is an updated version of Virtua Fighter 3, featuring battles between teams of various fighters, one after another is defeated.
